title: Shipyards Night Market - Fri, May 16
description:
Join us for the Shipyards Night Market in North Vancouver on Fri, May 16! Every Friday night, locals and visitors gather at the Shipyards District to indulge in a culinary extravaganza featuring over 40 food trucks, explore unique artisan vendors, enjoy live music and DJs, and unwind in the beer garden provided by The Garden Beer Market Co.

The Shipyards Night Market showcases:
• Beer Garden with local craft beer and cocktails
• Diverse food trucks offering cuisine from around the world
• Live music and DJ performances
• Artisan market vendors featuring handcrafted items

This vibrant weekly event runs from 5:00 PM to 10:00 PM at the waterfront Shipyards District in North Vancouver, with stunning views of Burrard Inlet and the Vancouver skyline. This market is a perfect evening out for families, couples, and friends looking to experience the best of North Vancouver's local food, craft, and entertainment scene.

venue.name: The Shipyards
venue.description: The Shipyards District in North Vancouver is a vibrant waterfront area featuring public plazas, restaurants, shops, and event spaces. With a stunning backdrop of Burrard Inlet and downtown Vancouver, this popular venue hosts various community events and markets throughout the year. The area pays homage to the region's shipbuilding heritage while offering modern amenities and gathering spaces.
